sections.name: Hero

contentSequences.description: Large H1 heading 'Fresh looks, bold stories, real life', subheading paragraph about style adventures, two CTA buttons ('See case' primary, 'All stories' secondary)
Grid of 3 images (hip-hop dance, family vacation, music concert) displayed in a compact grid layout

sections.notes: Two-column grid layout (text left, images right). Secondary/light background.

sections.name: Featured Article

contentSequences.description: Large landscape image on the left side (adventure spots)
Breadcrumb trail (Home > Case studies), H2 heading 'Fresh looks, bold moves, real stories', author name (Taylor Brooks), date (June 12, 2024), read time (4 min read)

sections.notes: Two-column grid layout (image left, text right). Light background.

sections.name: Image Gallery

contentSequences.description: Centered H2 heading 'Style in every snapshot' with subtitle paragraph 'Peek the latest looks in action'
4-column by 2-row grid of 8 square images showing various lifestyle scenes (dance, beach, concert, campus, gaming, fashion, campus tour)

sections.notes: Grey/secondary background. Images are square aspect ratio (1:1).

sections.name: Testimonials

contentSequences.description: Tabbed content area with 4 panels, each showing: person image on left, name + title + testimonial quote on right. People: Alex Rivera (Streetwear Enthusiast), Taylor Kim (Casual Style Blogger), Jordan Ellis (Trend Spotter), Morgan Blake (Party Scene Curator). Tab menu below with avatar thumbnails and names for each person.

sections.notes: Light background. Interactive tabs with switchable content. Tab menu at bottom with avatar images.

sections.name: Latest Articles

contentSequences.description: Centered H2 heading 'Latest articles' with subtitle 'Fresh looks, bold moves'
4-column grid of article cards. Each card has: image, category tag (Casual Cool/Beach Vibes/Night Out/Sport Mode), date, and H3 heading. Cards link to blog posts.

sections.notes: Grey/secondary background. Cards are clickable article links.

sections.name: FAQ

contentSequences.description: H2 heading 'Got questions? We've got answers.' with subheading 'Fashion FAQs, answered fast' on the left side

4 expandable FAQ items on the right side. Questions: 'How do I spot the latest trends?', 'Can I share my own outfit pics?', 'Where do you find your style inspo?', 'How can I join your community?'. Each has a collapsible answer.

sections.notes: Light background. Two-column layout (heading left, FAQ items right). Uses details/summary HTML elements.

sections.name: Bottom CTA

contentSequences.description: Full-bleed background image (networking event) with dark overlay. H2 heading 'Fresh looks, bold stories, real life', subheading paragraph about case study, and 'See more' CTA button with inverse styling.

sections.notes: Dark/inverse background with image overlay. Single full-width content block.

blockInventory.notes: All Block Collection blocks already present locally. Rich block palette available.
